Method Detail

validateUser

public int validateUser(int userid,
                        int candidateID)
Parameters:
userid - This is the user id that was entered to access Self Service. This id is what is going to be validated.
candidateID - this is the Direct Talent candidate id.
Returns:
- returns 1 if the login was successful and is the first time login. - returns 2 if the login was successful. - returns 3 if the login failed.

changeUserid

public boolean changeUserid(int oldUID,
                            int newUID,
                            int candidateID)
Parameters:
oldUID - - previous userid
newUID - - new userid
candidateID - - Direct Talent Candidate Id
Returns:
- returns true if the user id is changed. Returns false on failure
